channel.title: Has anyone seen the commercial for Halo 3?
channel.description: O my gosh, the graphics are amazing. Simply AMAZING. You know in movies when they do special effects? The graphics look like that. I looked at it and I said "Holy Crap". I would post a video if I could find it but...ya know...dial up ;D

item.title: Has anyone seen the commercial for Halo 3?
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

Some other companies are also make: Halo Wars, Halo Chronicles, Halo Something, and Halo Something else.

But they are all crap compared to the actual ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Has anyone seen the commercial for Halo 3?
item.dc:creator: @slayer215 slayer215
item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

http://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/viewer.aspx?productId=1084&assetTypeId=2&shotId=1

There ya go
Just make sure to put that you were born in like 1980, because I put in 1993 and it wouldnt let me see it.
It starts talking about the graphics at about 1:40

Screenshots at http://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/h/halo3/

Read full topic

item.title: Has anyone seen the commercial for Halo 3?
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

The graphics are better than real like… when you rotate your camera so that your looking at your guy you can see the reflection off his helmet.

Just a sec Im gunna go take a picture of something and post it.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 08:15:43 AM[/size][hr]Ok it wont host … Ill do it after school.

I have more but dont feel like hosting them. Also it looks crappier than the actually game because I took a picture of it then had to host it then post it.
